stimulusHtml:
Reproduction print used by permission of the Harvard Art Museums

In the work shown, Bahram Gur Fights the Karg, the depiction of the subject matter visually contributes to the story by
choicesHtml: drawing the viewer’s eye to details depicted in the background
using scale to convey the Karg’s intimidating cruelty
identifying the hero through his luxurious, kingly garb
directing the gaze of the king toward the viewer
